AddItem.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[Panel] item
  The item to add. It will be forced visible and parented to the DGrid.

RemoveItem.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[Panel] item
  Item to remove from the grid

[boolean] bDontDelete=false
  If set to true, the actual panel will not be removed via Panel:Remove.

SetColWide.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[number] colWidth
  The width of each column.

SetCols.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[number] cols
  The desired number of columns

SetRowHeight.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[number] rowHeight
  The height of each row

SortByMember.description:
DGRID [Client] 

[string] key
  A key in the panel from DGrid:GetItems. The key's value must be numeric.

[boolean] desc=true
  True for descending order, false for ascending.
